subject: Re: Lowes sharing for OR - Eugene PD
body:
You don't often get email from support@flocksafety.com. Learn why this is important <https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification>  
	

[EXTERNAL ?]

Hi there,
 
Moving Emma to bcc.
 
Detective Dewitt,

We are assisting in a process in coordination with Lowe�s to provide agencies around the country with access to Lowe�s camera for search capabilities as a part of their nationwide rollout. 

If you would like the opportunity to receive approval to access Lowe�s cameras, please have your Head of Agency complete the template below. You will need to make sure to update the highlighted data points as a part of this exercise. In order to keep requests moving quickly through the queue, please make sure to follow the template below including subject line and recipients. 

Once completed and sent over to the email address below, Lowe�s will review the template to make sure that the information has been completed appropriately and may request a call with the Head of the Agency requesting access. 

Please be patient with both Lowe�s and Flock as we anticipate a large volume of requests over the next couple of weeks to review. The camera share process is manual on the Flock side and once approved we will do our best to complete these in a timely manner. 

If your agency has any questions or concerns, they may reach out to their Flock Customer Success Manager who will direct them to the appropriate contact. 
� 
Email Subject Line- Lowe�s Camera Share; Name of the Agency
Email Template sent to: todd.a.isenhour@lowes.com and CC emma.jensen@flocksafety.com 


As TITLE for CITY/ COUNTY, I would like to formally request regional access to Lowe�s owned Flock safety systems and/or LiveView. This technology will assist in preventing or investigating criminal activity in the local community we both serve. Lowe�s technology and my department�s access to such will only be used for bona fide investigations, which are documented within our department and via audit trail within the Flock Safety platform. These investigative tools and technology will not be permitted for personal use, for use on unauthorized devices or by unauthorized users within our department.  I understand if the technology is not used correctly, Lowe's reserves the right to terminate the department�s access to Lowe's owned Flock Safety systems and/or LiveView.
 
 
Name
Signature of Head of Agency, Chief of Police or Sheriff
Title

Stay safe,
AC
 
--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: Emma Jensen [emma.jensen@flocksafety.com]
Sent: 11/15/2024, 9:46 AM
To: support@flocksafety.com; caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com
Cc: ddewitt@eugene-or.gov
Subject: Re: Lowes sharing for OR - Eugene PD


Hi there! I am going to loop in @Flock Safety Support support@flocksafety.com  to get an account created. I work primarily with our commercial team, so outside of handling Lowe's paperwork for LE customers they will be able to get the Detective what he needs.  
 
Thanks,
Emma 

On Thu, Nov 14, 2024 at 7:42?PM Caroline Fraher <caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com > wrote:

	Hi Emma,
	 
	Eugene PD has signed the Flock MOU with the goal of accessing Lowes cameras. I am waiting for Mark Smith to countersign our MOU. I will attach it here once I receive it. In the meantime, can you please assist Detective Derek DeWitt with the next steps (cc'd). Thanks! 
Hi 	 
 
Caroline Fraher
Territory Sales Manager



 https://www.instagram.com/flocksafety/ 

 https://www.facebook.com/flocksafety 

 https://www.youtube.com/c/FlockSafety 

 <https://cdn.gifo.wisestamp.com/s/rfm1/108062/26/trans.png>  310-844-3659 call/text   <https://cdn.gifo.wisestamp.com/s/rfw4/108062/26/trans.png>  flocksafety.com 

 <https://cdn.gifo.wisestamp.com/s/rfcustom/108062/26/trans.png>  caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com 

	
 

	
 https://www.wavy.com/news/local-news/james-city-county/jcc-police-investigate-road-rage-incident-as-victims-recover/ 

	
 	 
	 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/LqvQN3KRDRjb.png> 

 

To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an email to support+unsubscribe@flocksafety.com support+unsubscribe@flocksafety.com .
 <https://flocksafety.my.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?oid=00D6g000003tehf&esid=018Pi00000Qfai5&from=ext> 

thread::aGH9uQCRKJW9Bu3d8HYKRg4::
